original_title: 風魔の小次郎 最終章 風魔反乱篇
overview: It's been three months since the Sacred Sword War ended, & Kojiro and Ryoma are nowhere to be found. Back at the villiage of the Fuma clan, a group calling themselves the "Shinsei Fuma clan" forms, calling for an end to the clan of old... And those who are not with them are considered the enemy.
title: Kojiro of the Fuma: Fuma Rebellion Chapter
